title: UpdateHeres Why Our Diaspora Client Booked For Our Site Visit & Giving Him Expert Advice

tasks.task: Conduct a land survey for potential crop cultivation.
subtasks: Approach the farm location (Nsanwem suburb, Otu Kwejo).
Engage with the landowners to discuss crop history and current usage.
Verify land ownership and neighboring agreements.
Assess local threats, particularly cattle invasion.
Evaluate land topography, noting slopes and flat areas.

tasks.task: Plan water management infrastructure (mini-dam) for year-round crop cultivation.
subtasks: Determine water accumulation and release methods during rainy and dry seasons.
Consider the land's drainage and irrigation needs.
Estimate the potential benefits of year-round crop production.

tasks.task: Prepare a customized budget for the project.
subtasks: Gather cost data for necessary agricultural inputs and equipment.
Advise on quality standards for seeds, fertilizers, etc.
Recommend financing options and spending strategies.
